messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, I joined UKIP after losing all patience with those at Westminster, who have betrayed British interests to unelected EU bureaucrats. UKIP is described as a people’s army and that’s why I feel so comfortable in this great party; I am just a member of the community - not a career politician. If we, the people, do not take politics into our own hands, we will continue to be at the mercy of those elites, who demonstrate constantly, that they seek to rule us, rather than serve us. I think many people now realise this.

issues.brexitEurope: betrayed British interests to unelected EU bureaucrats
issues.governance: losing all patience with those at Westminster

leaflet.personalStatement: I am just a member of the community - not a career politician.

images.caption: Mike Glennon in East Worthing and Shoreham - Standing Up for Real Change
